releaseHighlight: Infrastructure improvements with enhanced AI model framework and enterprise Windows Group Policy support for better administrative control.
sourceContent:
Looking at the HTML content for the Windsurf Editor Changelog, I can find version 1.13.9:

## Version 1.13.9 Release Notes (January 16, 2026)

### Bug Fixes and Improvements

- **GPT-5.2-Codex harness improvements**: Enhanced the underlying framework for GPT-5.2-Codex model integration
- **Windows Group Policy support**: Administrators can now manage Windsurf restrictions and configurations through Windows Group Policy for enterprise deployments

This appears to be a maintenance release focused on infrastructure improvements and enterprise management capabilities.
